title: Can we prevent the situation where we see "sudo: unable to resolve host..."
body: I have been using Bash/WSL for a little while, including the sudo command, but starting yesterday I was seeing the message "sudo: unable to resolve host <MY_COMPUTER_NAME>" when invoking sudo.

comments.body: You can also delete /etc/hosts file and close and reopen Bash/WSL. File will be regenerated and message won't appear anymore.
